message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.ET, cs.IT, cs.GR 

This paper discusses the design of color filter arrays for image sensors, which is a topic related to computer vision (cs.CV). Additionally, the paper mentions optimization-based frameworks, which is a topic related to machine learning (cs.MM). The paper also discusses the challenges of designing color filter arrays for small pixels, which is a topic related to electronics and hardware (cs.ET). The paper also mentions luminance sensitivity and chrominance sensitivity, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the paper discusses the effectiveness of the proposed framework through experimental comparisons, which is a topic related to graphics (cs.GR).
